name: Tortured Souls
description:
Can you escape the dungeon in this deck building, procedurally-generated dungeon crawler? You, a wizard capable of harnessing the elements, find yourself in a weird dungeon full of elemental beings. Use spells, build your deck, defeat foes and escape the dungeon, but whatever you do, don't become another tortured soul!

Dual-analogue-stick gamepad required. Check out the creator's page at https://precipire.itch.io/tortured-souls

Note: created over two semesters at Macquarie University in Games Project A & B (COMP3150/3151).
